statements: SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE distance < 100;
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE start_location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT end_location, distance FROM routes WHERE distance > 50 ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_routes FROM routes;
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes ORDER BY distance ASC;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance FROM delivery_routes WHERE distance < 100;
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes WHERE start_location = 'City A' AND end_location = 'City B' ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance FROM delivery_routes WHERE distance BETWEEN 50 AND 150;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_routes FROM delivery_routes GROUP BY start_location ORDER BY total_routes DESC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance FROM delivery_routes WHERE route_id = 2;
SELECT efficiency_id, transport_mode FROM transportation_efficiency WHERE efficiency_rating > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes WHERE start_location = 'New York' ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance FROM delivery_routes WHERE distance < 100 ORDER BY end_location ASC;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance FROM delivery_routes ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance FROM delivery_routes WHERE distance > 50;

SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance, transport_mode, efficiency_rating FROM delivery_routes INNER JOIN transportation_efficiency ON delivery_routes.route_id = transportation_efficiency.route_id;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance FROM delivery_routes WHERE start_location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT route_id, start_location AS from_location, end_location AS to_location, distance * 1.6 AS distance_km FROM delivery_routes ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM delivery_routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance_km FROM delivery_routes ORDER BY distance_km DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, capacity_kg, max_speed_kmph FROM delivery_vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'Truck';
SELECT schedule_id, delivery_time FROM delivery_schedule WHERE delivery_time >= now();
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes WHERE distance_km > 50 ORDER BY distance_km DESC
SELECT start_location, end_location FROM delivery_routes WHERE start_location = 'City A' AND end_location = 'City B'
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance_km FROM delivery_routes WHERE distance_km BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY distance_km DESC
SELECT schedule_id, delivery_time FROM delivery_schedule WHERE delivery_time > '2023-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY delivery_time ASC
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, capacity_kg, max_speed_kmph FROM delivery_vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'Truck' ORDER BY capacity_kg DESC
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM delivery_routes WHERE distance > 10;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance FROM delivery_routes ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT * FROM route_schedule WHERE day_of_week='Monday';
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time FROM route_schedule WHERE departure_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance FROM delivery_routes WHERE distance > 50;
SELECT day_of_week, departure_time, start_location, end_location FROM route_schedule JOIN delivery_routes ON route_schedule.route_id = delivery_routes.route_id;
SELECT route_id, model, max_load_weight, assigned_date FROM route_assignment JOIN vehicle ON route_assignment.vehicle_id = vehicle.vehicle_id;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance FROM delivery_routes WHERE distance < 100 ORDER BY start_location DESC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes;
SELECT route_id, origin, destination FROM delivery_routes WHERE distance_miles > 100;
SELECT route_id, destination, distance_miles FROM delivery_routes ORDER BY distance_miles DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE type = 'Truck';
SELECT driver_id, name, license_number FROM drivers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_routes WHERE distance_miles > 100 ORDER BY destination ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT deliveries.delivery_id, stops.route_id, drivers.name FROM deliveries JOIN stops ON deliveries.route_id = stops.route_id JOIN drivers ON deliveries.vehicle_id = drivers.vehicle_id WHERE drivers.name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY deliveries.delivery_time DESC;
SELECT route_id, COUNT(delivery_id) AS num_deliveries FROM deliveries GROUP BY route_id HAVING num_deliveries > 2 ORDER BY num_deliveries DESC;
SELECT vehicles.type, SUM(vehicles.capacity_pounds) AS total_capacity FROM vehicles JOIN drivers ON vehicles.vehicle_id = drivers.vehicle_id GROUP BY vehicles.type HAVING total_capacity > 10000;
SELECT * FROM stops WHERE location IN ('Warehouse A', 'Warehouse B', 'Warehouse C') ORDER BY stop_order ASC LIMIT 3;
